nodes.text: Backstab 30 was a French roleplaying magazine from May of 2001. It contained many roleplaying articles, including an adventure which worked for both the West End Games D6 and Wizards of the Coast d20 roleplaying systems. The article was called "La Révolte d'Acier: Épisode 3 - À la recherche du Temple Maudit" and was written by both Oliver Collin and Cyril Pasteu.
